blog.name: boyfriendharriet
blog.title: Be A Lover
blog.description: Hi, we’re F And J, we’re 19/20 and we write some stuff. Request are always open. Treat people with kindness.

body:
Our masterlist

Here you can find everything we’ve written, we’ll also add everything we will write in the future. (Keep sending us requests! They’re always open!)

—

Braids and cookies - where Harry loves your baking and you love his hair.

Out of line - where you’re too busy for Harry and you don’t notice, but he does.

Dont touch her - the first time you’re having an anxiety attack in front of him.

“It’s a prank!” - where she makes a bet with Mitch and Harry’s not having it.

—

Our series:

Troubles - where Harrys ex get in the way.

Part 1

Part 2

Teach me - where you have hard time loving and showing affection but Harrys there to teach you.

Opening

—

Your requests:

Where Harry’s sick and paranoid

—

Stuff we helped in writing:

Poems for her

title: Smoke & Mirrors
body:
Smoke and Mirrors: a metaphor for a deceptive, fraudulent or insubstantial explanation or description.

10

It was the last night of tour and everybody seemed to be buzzin’. Harry felt like he’d been pumped full of drugs or something because he felt like he was floating. But he knew the real thing that…

Read more…

tags: I actually slept alright last night
title: An Entire Week
body:
You’ve been struggling with insomnia and forget a very important date.

A/N: Hi loves! I wrote this like a month ago just before I started posting when I was struggling to sleep, and it’s become a problem for me again so I thought I’d put it out there for you! It’s not very long, 1k of half angst half fluff. LOVE AND HUGS <3 Kate xx

Five nights in a row now you’ve struggled sleeping. You’re not sure why, and you’re not sure how to help it, but you know it’s beginning to be a bit of a piss take. You’d have no trouble getting to sleep, it had always taken you a while anyway, maybe an hour or so to succumb to unconsciousness, that was normal. But every night for almost a week now you’ve woken at around the same time - between midnight and one-ish - to find yourself wide awake for hours, rolling around the bed for no reason other than that you’re uncomfortable and wanted to find a good position to sleep in. That and that your brain for some reason wouldn’t keep its noise down.

There was only one solution you’ve come up with to get over it. It might seem a little obvious now but you don’t like to drink in the week for various reasons. So as Friday night finally roll around, you force yourself to stay awake later than usual, open a bottle of red you’ve been saving, and stick your boyfriend’s face on the telly.

It’s already nine o’clock by this point, and you can feel your eyes drooping before your love’s face has even appeared on the screen.

What you’re not expecting was the sound of a key turning in your front door. Only one person had a key for your flat, and that one person wasn’t due to visit for another week. Or so you thought anyway.

Harry’s lanky frame peers around the doorway with an adorable smile, dimples on full display and teeth peeking through his lips. “Hey you.”

You stare up at him for a moment, eyebrows knitting together as you blink over and over in utter confusion. It was another week right..? He’s not supposed to be here until a weeks time. That was the plan. The weekend before his birthday?

“What’s wrong?” Harry asks into your silence, standing straight and stepping into the room.

“You’re a week early?” You speak quietly, because you’re not even certain of yourself with your question.

Harry frowns at you, eyes burning with worry as he approaches your frame that’s buried between blankets and cushions in the corner of your sofa. “No… it’s the twenty-fifth, love. Like we said.” He crouches down as he speaks, his voice so lovely and warm but thick with concern.

You look from Harry to the digital clock on the wall in her kitchen. And there it is; Friday 25th January, 21:30. “Holy fucking shit balls.” You grumble. You’ve lost an entire fucking week.

The bags under your eyes are obvious now as Harry watches her, a sickening feeling growing in the pit of his stomach. You look exhausted, like you haven’t slept for a month, or overworked to the point you might collapse. And just as he was about to ask you what’s wrong you begin to flood with tears, your entire being shaking from your wracking sobs.

“Hey,” Harry coos, shuffling around you to bring you into his lap, one arm around your middle as the other hand pushes through your soft hair, “what’s happened, love?”

“I don’t know what the fuck is happening to me.” You cry, wiping your wet face with the back of your hands. “I’ve lost an entire week of my life, I’ve barely slept all week, work has been fucking tedious, and now you’re here!”

“Can go back home if y-,”

“No!” You scream, your head hitting his chest in frustration. “Fuck, H, that’s the last thing I want.” You whimper, your hand roaming his chest and neck, eventually bunching into the hair at the back of his neck. “Even put you on the fucking telly because I missed you.”

A soft chuckle escapes him as he glances at the TV to see Dunkirk paused fairly early on. “Then help me out a bit ‘cause I’m confused.”

“I had so much planned for when you came home, well not home but here.” You sigh, pulling away slightly to look at him properly. “Was gonna have dinner ready for you, I had a whole list of things to go and get for you and I don’t know what the hell happened but I just fucking forgot.”

“It doesn’t matter to me, lovie.” Harry assures you, wiping another stray tear from your cheek.

“It matters to me though, H.” You stress, unable to stop your hand fiddling with a stray curl by his ear. “You absolutely spoiled me on my birthday and I wanted to do the same for you, especially since I can’t come with you to celebrate.”

“It’s late anyway.” He brushes the subject, placing a sweet kiss to your forehead. “We agreed eight and it’s already nine-thirty. So you carry on watching me on the telly like you planned, I’ll make myself something to eat and we can finish the evening the way you had planned today. Tomorrow maybe you can do what you’d originally planned?”

You watch him for a while, not really sure how to respond. Your exhaustion is making you stupid. That was a perfectly sound plan wasn’t it? It sounds like it… You nod slowly, your hand automatically reaching up to bite your nails.

“Oi,” Harry scolds, snatching your hand away from your mouth, “told you to stop doing that.”

You’re about to protest but you know he’s right. “Sorry.” You mumble, curling into him.

“I love you, you know.” He hums as his chin rests on your head. “Hate it when you’re not with me.”

“I love you too.” You say with more confidence than anything else you’ve said all evening. Your hand slips between the fabric of his shirt to rest against his warm skin. “Maybe one day we’ll spend every day together.”

“I think that sounds a reasonable idea.” Harry agrees, pecking the top of your head again. “I’ll have to see what I can do about it.”

~~~

Mwah!

A soft chuckle escapes him as he glances at the TV to see Dunkirk paused fairly early on. “Then help me out a bit ‘cause I’m confused.”

“It’s late anyway.” He brushes the subject, placing a sweet kiss to your forehead. “We agreed eight and it’s already nine-thirty. So you carry on watching me on the telly like you planned, I’ll make myself something to eat and we can finish the evening the way you had planned today. Tomorrow maybe you can do what you’d originally planned?”

You watch him for a while, not really sure how to respond. Your exhaustion is making you stupid. That was a perfectly sound plan wasn’t it? It sounds like it… You nod slowly, your hand automatically reaching up to bite your nails.

“Oi,” Harry scolds, snatching your hand away from your mouth, “told you to stop doing that.”

You’re about to protest but you know he’s right. “Sorry.” You mumble, curling into him.

“I love you, you know.” He hums as his chin rests on your head. “Hate it when you’re not with me.”

“I love you too.” You say with more confidence than anything else you’ve said all evening. Your hand slips between the fabric of his shirt to rest against his warm skin. “Maybe one day we’ll spend every day together.”

“I think that sounds a reasonable idea.” Harry agrees, pecking the top of your head again. “I’ll have to see what I can do about it.”

trail.content:
You’ve been struggling with insomnia and forget a very important date.

A/N: Hi loves! I wrote this like a month ago just before I started posting when I was struggling to sleep, and it’s become a problem for me again so I thought I’d put it out there for you! It’s not very long, 1k of half angst half fluff. LOVE AND HUGS <3 Kate xx

Five nights in a row now you’ve struggled sleeping. You’re not sure why, and you’re not sure how to help it, but you know it’s beginning to be a bit of a piss take. You’d have no trouble getting to sleep, it had always taken you a while anyway, maybe an hour or so to succumb to unconsciousness, that was normal. But every night for almost a week now you’ve woken at around the same time - between midnight and one-ish - to find yourself wide awake for hours, rolling around the bed for no reason other than that you’re uncomfortable and wanted to find a good position to sleep in. That and that your brain for some reason wouldn’t keep its noise down.

There was only one solution you’ve come up with to get over it. It might seem a little obvious now but you don’t like to drink in the week for various reasons. So as Friday night finally roll around, you force yourself to stay awake later than usual, open a bottle of red you’ve been saving, and stick your boyfriend’s face on the telly.

It’s already nine o’clock by this point, and you can feel your eyes drooping before your love’s face has even appeared on the screen.

What you’re not expecting was the sound of a key turning in your front door. Only one person had a key for your flat, and that one person wasn’t due to visit for another week. Or so you thought anyway.

Harry’s lanky frame peers around the doorway with an adorable smile, dimples on full display and teeth peeking through his lips. “Hey you.”

You stare up at him for a moment, eyebrows knitting together as you blink over and over in utter confusion. It was another week right..? He’s not supposed to be here until a weeks time. That was the plan. The weekend before his birthday?

“What’s wrong?” Harry asks into your silence, standing straight and stepping into the room.

“You’re a week early?” You speak quietly, because you’re not even certain of yourself with your question.

Harry frowns at you, eyes burning with worry as he approaches your frame that’s buried between blankets and cushions in the corner of your sofa. “No… it’s the twenty-fifth, love. Like we said.” He crouches down as he speaks, his voice so lovely and warm but thick with concern.

You look from Harry to the digital clock on the wall in her kitchen. And there it is; Friday 25th January, 21:30. “Holy fucking shit balls.” You grumble. You’ve lost an entire fucking week.

The bags under your eyes are obvious now as Harry watches her, a sickening feeling growing in the pit of his stomach. You look exhausted, like you haven’t slept for a month, or overworked to the point you might collapse. And just as he was about to ask you what’s wrong you begin to flood with tears, your entire being shaking from your wracking sobs.

“Hey,” Harry coos, shuffling around you to bring you into his lap, one arm around your middle as the other hand pushes through your soft hair, “what’s happened, love?”

“I don’t know what the fuck is happening to me.” You cry, wiping your wet face with the back of your hands. “I’ve lost an entire week of my life, I’ve barely slept all week, work has been fucking tedious, and now you’re here!”

“Can go back home if y-,”

“No!” You scream, your head hitting his chest in frustration. “Fuck, H, that’s the last thing I want.” You whimper, your hand roaming his chest and neck, eventually bunching into the hair at the back of his neck. “Even put you on the fucking telly because I missed you.”

A soft chuckle escapes him as he glances at the TV to see Dunkirk paused fairly early on. “Then help me out a bit ‘cause I’m confused.”

“I had so much planned for when you came home, well not home but here.” You sigh, pulling away slightly to look at him properly. “Was gonna have dinner ready for you, I had a whole list of things to go and get for you and I don’t know what the hell happened but I just fucking forgot.”

“It doesn’t matter to me, lovie.” Harry assures you, wiping another stray tear from your cheek.

“It matters to me though, H.” You stress, unable to stop your hand fiddling with a stray curl by his ear. “You absolutely spoiled me on my birthday and I wanted to do the same for you, especially since I can’t come with you to celebrate.”

“It’s late anyway.” He brushes the subject, placing a sweet kiss to your forehead. “We agreed eight and it’s already nine-thirty. So you carry on watching me on the telly like you planned, I’ll make myself something to eat and we can finish the evening the way you had planned today. Tomorrow maybe you can do what you’d originally planned?”

You watch him for a while, not really sure how to respond. Your exhaustion is making you stupid. That was a perfectly sound plan wasn’t it? It sounds like it… You nod slowly, your hand automatically reaching up to bite your nails.

“Oi,” Harry scolds, snatching your hand away from your mouth, “told you to stop doing that.”

You’re about to protest but you know he’s right. “Sorry.” You mumble, curling into him.

“I love you, you know.” He hums as his chin rests on your head. “Hate it when you’re not with me.”

“I love you too.” You say with more confidence than anything else you’ve said all evening. Your hand slips between the fabric of his shirt to rest against his warm skin. “Maybe one day we’ll spend every day together.”

“I think that sounds a reasonable idea.” Harry agrees, pecking the top of your head again. “I’ll have to see what I can do about it.”

~~~

Mwah!

summary:
i’ll post the one from harry’s account tonight!
yourusername: I went from wanting to marry Harry to even have a name for our...
body:
i’ll post the one from harry’s account tonight!

yourusername: I went from wanting to marry Harry to even have a name for our future kids picked out (I’m that nuts) to being incredibly heartbroken when the media spread around news that he was dating a model (I threw away all of the stuff related to him and took down my two giant poster in my bedroom—16 years old me was very upset 🤣) to really trying to get him out of my head to finally succeed getting rid of him from my head to have one tiny thing remind me of him and crap next thing I know I’m back to square one to being so happy and surprised when all of sudden God crossed our paths and then the next thing I know I’m Mrs Styles 😭💔 #sappycaptiononweddingdayismandatory

fan1: Sooo Harry Styles is officially no longer on the market? 😭

fan2: I’m so happy for you two but I can’t say my heart doesn’t break a little. Now excuse me while I go read some fanfiction to soothe the hurt.

fan3: I’m trying to type congratulations without weeping and I failed miserably.

gemmastyles: Not to be cheesy but you two are meant to be together ❤️

niallhoran: Massive congratulations you two! Xx realbarbarapalvin: Baby Styles is almost here you guys.

harrystyles: 16 years old you must have been so cute.

yourusername: @harrystyles 16 years old me would have whacked you in the dick.

harrystyles: @yourusername ouch. Glad I met you a little later then.

tags: i will literally never love anyone more than him
summary: “Who’s to say that young girls who like pop music - short for popular, right? - have worse musical taste than a 30-year-old...
body:
reminder that harry styles said👏🏻this👏🏻

“Who’s to say that young girls who like pop music - short for popular, right? - have worse musical taste than a 30-year-old hipster guy? That’s not up to you to say. There’s no goal posts. Young girls like the Beatles. You gonna tell me they’re not serious?”

“They’re our future. Our future doctors, lawyers, mothers, presidents, they kind of keep the world going.”

“Teenage-girl fans- they don’t lie. If they like you, they’re there. They don’t act ‘too cool.’ They like you and they tell you. Which is sick.”

stan a king, stan harry styles🥰
